Sentencas: To achieve the global carbon neutrality goal proposed by the United Nations, seeking alternative affordable energy sources and efficient energy conversion ways has become extensive concerns.
Titulo: Advances in power generation from ammonia via electrocatalytic oxidation in direct ammonia fuel cells

Sentencas: The varied applications of hydrogen energy are greatly valued for the past decades, as it releases less greenhouse gas emissions compared to traditional fossil fuels.
Titulo: Advances in power generation from ammonia via electrocatalytic oxidation in direct ammonia fuel cells

Sentencas: However, large-scale hydrogen utilization is primarily limited by its storage and longdistance transportation challenges.
Titulo: Advances in power generation from ammonia via electrocatalytic oxidation in direct ammonia fuel cells

Sentencas: In recent years, ammonia has been considered as an ideal alternative to hydrogen because as a good carbon-free energy carrier it shows high hydrogen content, high energy density, and easy storage and transportation.
Titulo: Advances in power generation from ammonia via electrocatalytic oxidation in direct ammonia fuel cells

Sentencas: In this case, direct ammonia fuel cells (DAFCs) have received considerable attention.
Titulo: Advances in power generation from ammonia via electrocatalytic oxidation in direct ammonia fuel cells

Sentencas: Ammonia oxidation reaction (AOR) over the anode exhibits a complex mechanism and slower kinetics under the lower operation temperatures compared to the hydrogen oxidation reaction (HOR) in the fuel cells.
Titulo: Advances in power generation from ammonia via electrocatalytic oxidation in direct ammonia fuel cells

Sentencas: Hence, this review provides an in-time summary of the recent understanding of electrochemical AOR mechanisms and the progress in electrocatalysts design for various types of DAFCs operating from room to elevated operation temperatures.
Titulo: Advances in power generation from ammonia via electrocatalytic oxidation in direct ammonia fuel cells

Sentencas: Additionally, the performance optimization of DAFCs and the existing challenges for achieving high AOR activity and selectivity in practical fuel cells are thoroughly discussed.
Titulo: Advances in power generation from ammonia via electrocatalytic oxidation in direct ammonia fuel cells
